entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 1:30 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: NW 31 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
